channel.title: CVE Feed for SUSE -- libzypp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SUSE -- libzypp

item.title: CVE-2017-7436|2024-09-16T19:09:24.691Z -- suse -- libzypp
item.description: In libzypp before 20170803 it was possible to retrieve unsigned packages without a warning to the user which could lead to man in the middle or malicious servers to inject malicious RPM packages into a users system.
